body.name: EDJO Wireless Keyboard, 2.4G Ergonomic Full Size Wireless Computer Keyboard with Wrist Rest for Windows, Mac OS Desktop/Laptop/PC（Black）
body.merchantInfo: Sold by KYX Elec and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 【Ergonomic Wireess Keyboard】EDJO Full-sized wireless keyboard is ergonomically designed with palm rest and folding holder that can keep it at an optimum slope, prevent your wrists from hurting while long sessions of typing. Keyboard is also designed with anti-slide pads so it will stay in place when you're typing quickly. Note: The USB receiver is in the battery compartment of the the keyboard, you can find it when open the keyboard battery cover.
【Plug & Play 2.4G Wireless Connection】Plug & play, no need to download any software. 2.4 GHz wireless provides a powerful and reliable connection up to 33 feet(10m) without any delays.

【Automatic Power Saving Function】The EDJO wireless keyboard has the function of automatically entering the power-saving state. When you stop using the keyboard more than 30 minutes, it will enter sleep mode to save power. This feature greatly extends the battery life, you can click any button to activity the device. The keyboard need 1 x AA battery. (Battery Not Included)

【Full Size 104 Keys Wireless Keyboard】This wireless keyboard uses the classic 104-key design style, there are Number Lock indicator/ Caps Lock indicator/ Power indicator in the upper right corner of the keyboard, the bottom of the keyboard is equipped with an adjustable stand.

【One Year Warranty Service & Universal Compatibility】This wireless keyboard and mice combo compatible with windows XP/Vista/7/8/10/X, Mac and other operating system. Works well with desktops, Chrome-book, PC, Laptop, Computer and more. If you encounter any problems during use, please contact us, we provide one year warranty service.
body.description: Wireless Keyboard With Comfortable Palm Rest Protect Your Wrist From Injury This computer keyboard with palm rest is designed to protect your wrist from injury during long-term typing. If you are a person who uses the keyboard for a long time, you should undoubtedly choose this Integrated palm rest keyboard to protect your wrist. The bottom of the keyboard are also equipped with a foldable feet, so that you can adjust the most comfortable angle for typing. Automatic Power Saving Function. Quiet Crater-switch. Keyboard Indicator Light. 2.4G Wireless Connection.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Integrated Palm Rest Computer Keyboard Brand of EDJO EDJO is a professional computer peripheral equipment manufacturer with more than 15 years of history, with a development team and a factory. We are committed to the development and production of wireless keyboards, wireless mice, gaming mechanical keyboards and other computer peripheral products. We used to only sell wholesale in offline stores, and now we are starting to sell online. Choose EDJO products, you will find that it is worthwhile and you will love with this brand. Wireless Keyboard With Comfortable Palm Rest Protect Your Wrist From Injury This computer keyboard with palm rest is designed to protect your wrist from injury during long-term typing. If you are a person who uses the keyboard for a long time, you should undoubtedly choose this Integrated palm rest keyboard to protect your wrist. The bottom of the keyboard are also equipped with a foldable feet, so that you can adjust the most comfortable angle for typing. Automatic Power Saving Function. Quiet Crater-switch. Keyboard Indicator Light. 2.4G Wireless Connection.

Automatic Power Saving Function EDJO wireless computer keyboard can automatically enter the power-saving state when you stop using the keyboard for more than 30 minutes. Quiet Crater-switch This wireless keyboard with crater-switch design and anti-oxidation Sealed membrane, greatly extend the life of the keyboard. 12 Multimedia Shortcuts EDJO wireless keyboard has 12 multimedia shortcuts that can easily to instant access music, volume, browser, email, etc.

2.4G Wireless Connection Plug and Play, no need to download any software. 2.4 GHz wireless provides a powerful and reliable connection up to 33 feet(10m) without any delays. Where is the USB Receiver? The USB receiver is stored in the keyboard battery compartment, you can find it when you open the battery cover. Three Indicator Lights EDJO wireless keyboard has Number Lock Indicator, Caps Lock Indicator and Power indicator, which can indicate working status.

IMPORTANT NOTE Copy Shortcut Buttons Combination in Mac System： Win + CPaste Shortcut Buttons Combination in Mac System： Win + VCopy Shortcut Buttons Combination in Windows and others System： Ctrl + CPaste Shortcut Buttons Combination in Windows and others System： Ctrl + V

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buetooth is aweful - update to 5 stars
reviews.reviewText: I am changing my original review as although the keyboard did not work for me, the seller was IMMEDIATELY emailing me trying to make it right. They offered to send another one free of charge (which I would have done but I have t pay for shipping as I live out of the country), or refund me in total. I dragged my feet for a long time,but they stood by their word and mad it right. This is a GREAT company, very responsive and willing to stand by the products they sell. I would certainly buy from them again!I doo hwto spell and tye, but this is how god the bllutooth works on thisskeyoard. I type for a living and this obiisly makesit ery difcult. Myeboar ibout 8inches frrm the dongle ayet, it doesn't pick uppmost kss typed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It was perfect, but .....
reviews.reviewText: After a few days the keys would stop working, then started again, mid-sentence, and sporadically, I returned it, but am not sure yet I will get to keep the refund. They said if it was not the right product or think it still works.. they will re-charge me for it. I love it, so why would I return it if it worked fine??

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Slow keyboard, doesn't keep up
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. It's a nice keyboard, but I type about 90wpm and many times this keyboard is not able to keep up. Not sure if it's the keyboard itself or the bluetooth connection (as others have noted here). I like the quiet keys, but the typos created by the keyboard's inability can be incredibly frustrating. I missed the return window so I am still trying to make this work, but it's likely I will donate the keyboard and purchase anoher. VIDEO: This s an exampe of ow fast type and how the keybord is no able to keep up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does what it says
reviews.reviewText: Very simple setup, works great on Linux. All you need to do is install a battery and plug the receiver into your pc/laptop and you're good to go. Has a nice sleep feature to conserve battery and wakes up instantly upon use. At the time of this review it's probably $5 more expensive than it needs to be. They did offer a $2 coupon but this shouldn't be more than $20.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really great keyboard for a nice low price.
reviews.reviewText: This is a GREAT keyboard. It has a soft touch and there is an instruction manual that tells how to shortcut some features. I'm happy I bought it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quite an sturdy keyboard
reviews.reviewText: It is not like those flimsy keyboards that move around a lot . It is oversized and well made and wireless

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not working as expected
reviews.reviewText: More than half the time the keys don't work. I have to retype a sentence sometimes 3 times. Unfortunately, my return window is closed, and I don't have the box anymore. It's only been 3 months now. Hopefully, the seller will respond to my review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not the best, but works for what i needed
reviews.reviewText: I bought this keyboard for work and didn’t want to spend a fortune. The cost was where i wanted, but the quality lacks a bit to be desired. It arrived in the manufacturer’s box and had gotten beat up a bit in transit. It has a lot if bend and just feels cheap. I do like that seeing that it’s battery operated (2xAA) it turns itself off when not in use and turns back on as soon as you press a key. The switches are nothing to write home about but as i said for a full size, inexpensive keyboard it gets the job done. As i do work on a computer daily i will definitely be buying a better keyboard with a bit bigger keys and better switches. If you don’t need a quality keyboard then this one does work fine, it just isn’t meant for day to day use.
